Class InputStreamHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mpxj.common.InputStreamHelper

  • public class InputStreamHelper
extends Object
    Helper methods for dealing with InputStreams.

        new byte array instance

      • read

        public static byte[] read(InputStream is,
                          int size)
                   throws IOException
        Reads a specified number of bytes from the input stream and populates a new byte array. If the required number of bytes can't be read an exception will be raised.
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream instance
        size - number of bytes to read
        Returns:
        new byte array instance
        Throws:
        IOException

      • read

        public static byte[] read(InputStream is,
                          byte[] data)
                   throws IOException
        Read bytes from the input stream to fill the provided array. If the array can't be filled an exception will be raised.
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream instance
        data - array to fill
        Returns:
        filled byte array
        Throws:
        IOException

      • read

        public static byte[] read(InputStream is,
                          byte[] data,
                          int size)
                   throws IOException
        Read bytes from the input stream to fill the provided array. If the array can't be filled with the requested number of bytes, an exception will be raised.
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream instance
        data - array to fill
        size - number of bytes to read
        Returns:
        filled byte array
        Throws:
        IOException

      • skip

        public static void skip(InputStream stream,
                        long skip)
                 throws IOException
        The documentation for InputStream.skip indicates that it can bail out early, and not skip the requested number of bytes. I've encountered this in practice, hence this helper method.
        Parameters:
        stream - InputStream instance
        skip - number of bytes to skip
        Throws:
        IOException
